00035 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer() {
00036     _attach_0();
00037 }
00038 
00050 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const nothrow_integer& b) {
00051     try {
00052         if (!b.is_nan()) _attach(b);
00053     } catch (std::exception&) {
00054         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00055     }
00056 }

00068 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const integer& b) {
00069     try {
00070         _attach(b);
00071     } catch (std::exception&) {
00072         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00073     }
00074 }

00083     try {
00084         _attach(b);

00091 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00092     try {
00093         _attach(from_string(str, base));
00094     } catch (std::exception&) {
00095         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00096     }
00097 }

00103 bool nothrow_integer::odd() const {
00104     if (is_nan()) return false;
00105     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00106 }
00107 
00112 bool nothrow_integer::even() const {
00113     if (is_nan()) return false;
00114     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00115 }
00116 
00121 int nothrow_integer::sign(bool signed_zero) const {
00122     if (is_nan()) return 0;
00123     if (!signed_zero && _is_zero()) return 0;
00124     else return (_get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00125 }
00126 
00131 size_t nothrow_integer::hex_digits() const {
00132     try {
00133         size_t bits=_log2();
00134         return (bits+3)/4; // Four bits per hex digit, rounded up
00135     } catch (std::exception&) {
00136         return 0;
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00146 bool nothrow_integer::is_nan() const {
00147     return _is_nan();
00148 }

00150 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator+=(const nothrow_integer& addend) {
00151     try {
00152         detail::add(*this, *this, addend);
00153     } catch (std::exception&) {
00154         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00155     }
00156     return *this;
00157 }

00160     try {
00161         detail::subtract(*this, *this, subtrahend);
00162     } catch (std::exception&) {
00163         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00164     }
00165     return *this;

00168 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(
00169     nothrow_integer) c)
00170 {
00171     try {
00172         _attach(c);
00173     } catch (std::exception&) {
00174         _base_attach(0);
00175     }
00176     return *this;
00177 }

00179 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator-() const { return negate(*this); }

00181 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator*=(const nothrow_integer& b) { detail::multiply(*this, *this, b); return *this; }
00182 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator/=(const nothrow_integer& b) { detail::divide(*this, *this, b); return *this; }
00183 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator%=(const nothrow_integer& b) { detail::mod(*this, *this, b); return *this; }

00185 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator++() { _make_unique(true); _increment(); return *this; }
00186 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator--() { _make_unique(true); _decrement(); return *this; }
00187 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator++(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; _make_unique(true); _increment(); return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(s); }
00188 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator--(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; _make_unique(true); _decrement(); return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(s); }

00190 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00191 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00192 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator&=(const nothrow_integer& n) { detail::bitwise_and(*this, *this, n); return *this; }
00193 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator|=(const nothrow_integer& n) { detail::bitwise_or(*this, *this, n); return *this; }
00194 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator^=(const nothrow_integer& n) { detail::bitwise_xor(*this, *this, n); return *this; }

00196 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00197     try {
00198         detail::shift_left(*this, *this, shift);
00199     } catch (std::exception&) {
00200         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00201     }
00202     return *this;
00203 }

00205 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator>>=(size_t shift) {
00206     try {
00207         detail::shift_right(*this, *this, shift);
00208     } catch (std::exception&) {
00209         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00210     }
00211     return *this;
00212 }

00214 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::zero() {
00215     if (cZero.get()==0) {
00216         cZero.reset(new nothrow_integer(integer::zero()));
00217         cZero->_set_readonly();
00218     }
00219     return *cZero;
00220 }
00221 
00222 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::one() {
00223     if (cOne.get()==0) {
00224         cOne.reset(new nothrow_integer(integer::one()));
00225         cOne->_set_readonly();
00226     }
00227     return *cOne;
00228 }
00229 
00230 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::nan() {
00231     if (cNaN.get()==0) {
00232         cNaN.reset(new nothrow_integer());
00233         cNaN->_base_attach(0);
00234         cNaN->_set_readonly();
00235     }
00236     return *cNaN;
00237 }
00238 
00239 void nothrow_integer::_make_unique(bool) {
00240     try {
00241         detail::base_integer::_make_unique();
00242     } catch (std::exception&) {
00243         _base_attach(0); // Turns it into a Not-a-Number.
00244     }
00245 }
